title: Getting random freezes
body: for the past few days, I've been getting these really random freezes but it doesn't seem like lag or an fps issue. Usually, when people are lagging, the game stops for a moment, ping goes super high and then suddenly its speeds back up. My ping stays at 60 which isn't bad at all and my fps also at 60. Everything around me gameplay wise keeps going with no issues, i just can't control my characters abilities or movement. I can however move the camera and watch others while i wait for it to stop.

replies.body: Even though your ping might look okay, you can still have major packet loss which can cause input delays like what you're seeing.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) on these matches to know for sure.  The results will also provide troubleshooting instructions specific to your issue to help.  Hopefully, this will get you fixed up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=anGYQgtE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-24T23:00:22.904+0000)
>
> Even though your ping might look okay, you can still have major packet loss which can cause input delays like what you're seeing.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) on these matches to know for sure.  The results will also provide troubleshooting instructions specific to your issue to help.  Hopefully, this will get you fixed up!

Looks like I have been experiencing some packet loss recently based on the log reader. Thanks a ton for your help and response back!
